components: ENGINE AND ENGINE COOLING,FUEL SYSTEM, OTHER
summary: MY 2002 ACURA RSX EMITS A TERRIBLE ROTTEN EGG ODOR AFTER I DRIVE IT FOR ABOUT FIVE MINUTES AND STOP FOR A STOP SIGN.  THE SMELL COMES BACK INTERMITENTLY WHILE DRIVING SOMETIMES BECOMING QUITE OVERPOWERING IN THE CAR.  THE DEALER HAS NO SOLUTION.  HYDROGEN SULFIDE IS A POISONOUS GAS.  THE SITUATION IS ON GOING AND HAVE BEEN BACK TO THE DEALER MANY TIMES.
